narrative_summary: - User asked how to select dbt assets that have an immediate upstream Fivetran asset as a dependency using asset selection syntax
- Read the asset selection reference file at `skills/dagster-expert/references/cli/asset-selection.md` to review traversal syntax
- Explained the correct selection syntax: `kind:fivetran+1 and kind:dbt` — selecting 1 level downstream of Fivetran assets intersected with dbt assets
